Title: Authorizes the commissioner of transportation to issue a permit exempting certain signs that appear on the Seaway Trail
Summary: Authorizes the commissioner of transportation to issue a permit exempting certain signs that appear on the Seaway Trail; provides such exemption is for permits issued in the town of Alexandria in 1988 and 2022.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the commissioner of transportation to issue a permit exempting certain signs
